page.title: 08FARMING/AGRICULTURE.
page.content: {FARMING/AGRICULTURE} We made a study of three farms in our area.Ty'n y Coed Farm has 98 acres and plant 10 acres of potatoes,16 acres of barley,22 acres for silage and the rest arable.A full time farmer,he has 70 beef cattle.The second farm of six acres ,the farmer works part time and has 73 pigs . The third farm is 25 acres and keeps 25 beef cattle, but also has 25 caravans on the land.He is also a part time farmer/teacher. Rabbits,foxes and badgers seem to cause most problems to the three farmers, but one complained of dogs attacking sheep and cattle. Public footpaths cross all three farms.
